content: **knitted mittens for men in drops nepal the piece is worked with nordic pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ne-380 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl circumference 22-24 cm length 24-25 cm without rib **yarn** colour alternative 1 drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 0612 medium brown 50-50 g colour 0206 light beige colour alternative 2 drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 0506 dark grey 50-50 g colour 0500 light grey **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 27 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
